data.text: @JASMINiWORLD Hi Jasmin. I'm sorry to hear about your luggage. The social media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace customers bags. You may contact our Baggage Services Team here: https://t.co/lBL1iu5SBJ. Thanks - H
@ninetyninexxmn Hi there, thanks for the tweet. We've already responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen
@CallyFona Sorry to hear this, Cal. Could you please DM specific information about what has gone wrong so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M

@JetteVirdi I’m sorry to hear about the service provided by our staff at Bali airport. We do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times so it’s disappointing if this isn’t the level of service you received. Kindly DM us more information so we can further assist. – Joie
@adventuresofjpt Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I'm glad you enjoyed your recent flight with us from Okinawa to Narita. We hope to see you on-board again soon. Regards - Joie
@bananapancakees Thanks for the tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to resend in English so we can assist? Thanks - Yen

@raysaurav1989 Hi Saurav, sorry to hear that you are having difficulties changing your flight. Are you able to send me  DM with a screenshot of the error message along with your full name and booking reference number? -Camille

@woiieee I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. You can monitor your flight here: https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. Thanks - Jerry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @Lukewarmed Hi Luke, thanks for the tweet. As of this writing, there’s no active Travel alerts to Ho Chi Minh city. I would advised to check our Travel alerts page here: https://t.co/1Y9uDm9HWt for more updates. Regards - Joie

@GenesitKUN Hi Genesis, thanks for getting in touch. As you have tagged Jetstar Asia on your picture amazing photo, we have regrammed this. I'm sorry if you have not been tagged. I'll be sure to pass this on to the relevant team. -Camille

@hugetwidodo Hi Teguh,

I’m sorry to hear that you have not received your boarding pass. Please go to website and click on  Manage Booking and you may reprint your boarding pass there.

Regards,

Chichi

@kimuyswabe Hi Kim, thanks for the tweet and I’m sorry to hear that you are having difficulties accessing our website. I’ve checked this and as of this writing, I can confirm that no current website outage. I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a difference browser. - J

@sherylnatalieng Hi Sheryl, sorry to hear that you had to pay additional at the airport. If you've arrived at the airport and exceeded our carry on size and weight restrictions, you will incur additional fees. Please send us a DM of your full name and booking reference so we can check. -Camille

@limjr7 Hi Mike, thanks for the tweet. It may help to know that you may bring 2 carry-on baggage as long as the combine weight does not exceed 7kg. You may wish to check our website here https://t.co/VGqumObmCx for more details. Thanks – Yen

@dreamingofyoo Hi Cloudy, I understand that you are enquiring if you can avail senior citizen discounts for Osaka to Manila flights. As a low-cost airline, we don't have discounts for senior citizens. -Camille

domain.name: Place
domain.description: Named places in the world, like Fenway Park

data.text: @dov_Now HI. I'm sorry if there was a confusion about the "Free Fare". We make sure that our Terms and Conditions of the sale fare are provided on our website. Please note that we specifically advised the Free Fare will only apply on the base fare and not the entire full fare. Thanks - H

RT @lloydthelostboy: Flying @Jetstar_Asia out of @ChangiAirport over the holidays? Skip the queues and use FAST check-in! ✈️

https://t.co/…

@dov_Now Hi. The Return for Free sale is applicable for flights departing Jakarta to Singapore. You will be paying for the full fare of your outbound flight with taxes and pay only the taxes for your return. Please know that taxes and fees may vary and flights are subject to availability.

entity.description: Conversation about global finance and economies.

data.text: @vinamelody Hi Vina. It may help to know that the screenshot that you have provided is no longer updated as I've tried to replicate it on our end and the website is working fine. As mentioned you may want to clear cache to have the updated version of our website. Thanks - H

@vinamelody Hi Vina, I'm sorry to hear that you are having difficulties accessing your booking online. I'd recommend clearing your browser’s cookies and cache to ensure that you have the most updated version of our website. Let us know how you go. -Camille
@Armil72rt Thanks for the tweet. For your privacy protection, I recommend for you to remove your tweet containing your booking reference and DM us your details instead. Thanks - Yen
@jejooy Thanks for keeping in touch. So we can check this for you, please DM us your booking reference. We'll check if your fare is refundable. Thanks - Jerry

@Armil72rt Hi Armil. Thanks for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear that you are receiving continuous emails from us. We'll make sure to take your feedback into consideration to improve our services for our customers. Regards - Ann

@paan_fadzlishah Hi Farhan. Thanks for reaching out. I understand you need assistance with checking in for your flight. So we can check, kindly send us a DM of your booking reference and full name you used. Regards - Ann
@SantosCharm Hey Charm, I've followed you here so can send us a DM. Thanks -J

@SantosCharm Hi Charm. Thanks for your reply. Allow me to rectify my previous response. I believe that our social media team has discussed this with you via another Twitter thread. You may wish to view that interaction instead. Regards - Ann

data.text:
@SantosCharm Hi Charm,

Thanks for contacting us.

I believe we have sent you a DM regarding this. You might want to check it out for your reference.

Regards - Ann

@Fashdiva69 Thanks for the Tweet, Fashdiva. We advise our customers not to post any personal information (such as case ID) publicity for confidentiality and security purposes. You may wish to delete this Tweet. I’ve also responded to your DM. –M

@Fashdiva69 Thanks for the Tweet, Fashdiva. We advise our customers not to post any personal information (such as case ID) publicity for confidentiality and security purposes. You may wish to delete this Tweet. I’ve also responded to your DM. –M
@itsgaeun Could you please DM your booking reference and full name so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M 2/2

@itsgaeun I’m sorry if you haven’t yet received your flight itinerary. It can take up to 24hr for a confirmation email to be sent by Jetstar. And occasionally, your email provider may decide that your itinerary is spam and may fail to deliver it to you or move it to a junk mail folder. 1/2
@tetrasherilla1 Hi There, I’ve responded to your DM, please check your inbox. –M
@jejooy Thanks for getting back to us. So I can check this for you, kindly send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. Thanks – Yen
@jejooy Thanks for the tweet and I’m sorry to hear about this. We haven't had any reported errors on our website. I suggest clearing your browser cookies and cache. Thanks –Yen
@lie_kenny Hi Kenny, I’ve responded to your DM, please check your inbox. –M

@FontanaLuca3 Sorry to hear this, Fontana. Our crew have responsibilities in making sure of the safety of a flight or operation, but have every right to expect polite, friendly and professional service, whenever you fly with us and I apologise if the service didn’t meet your expectations. –M
@JennyJusuf Hi Jenny, sorry about the confusion. Kindly provide us these details via DM. Thanks - Yen

@JennyJusuf Hi Jenny,

Thanks for your messaging us.

So I can check this for you, kindly provide us your booking reference/flight details and your full name used in the booking.

Thanks – Yen

@LovelyCorrine Thanks for the tweet and I’m sorry to hear about this. We haven't had any reported errors on our website and mobile app. I suggest clearing your browser cookies and cache. If error still persists, could you please provide us a screenshot of the error via DM. Thanks –Yen
@HeyItsStephy 2/2 Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name and we’ll see on how we can further assist.  Regards - Joie

@HeyItsStephy 1/2 I’m sorry to hear about the delayed baggage. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination. I apologise if this wasn't your experience.
@dreamingofyoo Hi Cloudy, thanks for the tweet. I have replied to your tweet over our Jetstar Australia Twitter page. Regards - Joie

data.text: @ystan_ 2/2 You may want to contact our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/IJi3xk8y0g so they can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks - Hazel

@ystan_ 1/2 Hi there. Sorry to hear about your luggage. Please be assured that we take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you in the condition we received them. I can appreciate how upsetting it is if this doesn't happen. Please accept my apologies.
@kevinsln Hi Kevin. Thanks for contacting us. Please be advised that I have responded to your DM. Kindly check this for your reference. Regards - Ann
@adityalesmana Hi Aditya, thanks for your tweet. Could advise further details on what’s gone wrong so we can check this for you? Thanks - Lee
@Maynggg I’ve checked this and can confirm that our website is currently working fine. I suggest clearing the browser cache and cookies or try using a different browser. Let me know if this works. –M
@Maynggg Hi Mayng, I'm a little unsure of this. Could you please provide specific information about what has gone wrong so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M

@vpardosoriano Hi. Sorry to hear if you're unhappy with service provided by our staff at Changi airport. You have every right to look forward to prompt and courteous service whenever you travel on one of our flights, and I apologise if the service you received didn’t meet your expectations. -H

data.text: @vpardosoriano 2/2 our 7kg carry-on baggage restrictions, you will be required to check the baggage in for a fee.  Please see here for information: https://t.co/V06mtl6D4l. I'm sorry if you were unaware of this.  Thanks - H

@vpardosoriano 1/2 Hi. Sorry to hear if incurred additional charges at the airport. It may help to know that if at any time before the flight departs our staff note that the combined weight of your items may be more than your allowance your bag will be weighed and if you have exceeded

data.text: @JeffLim100 Hi Jeff, I've already responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen
@JeffLim100 Hi Jeff, I’ve responded to your DM, please check your inbox. –M
@ranranadn Hi Khairana, I have responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. :) - Camille
@HeavenWizU Hi, I have responded to your DM. -Camille

Great work @jemmawei! You can catch the full Okinawa action here!
https://t.co/r9QsbhCMQw https://t.co/xatJsoNSOg
@KellyOngMas Hey Kelly, thanks for the tweet. We aren't able to discuss your booking publicly. Please send us a DM. You may also want to consider hiding your tweet. -J
@mate_facile Hi Miracle. We will respond via DM.

@lloydthelostboy I’m sorry to hear that you’re feeling unwell at the moment. I understand that you would like to make changes to your booking due to unexpected circumstance. So we can further assist you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Joie

@AilsaBonner Hi Ailsa, thanks for the tweet and I understand that you are enquiring about your flight BL 131, Ho Chi Minh City to Bangkok flight status. I have checked this for you and as of this writing I can confirm that flight BL 131 will depart as schedule until further notice. – Joie

@amandaaaq Hi Amanda, thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. Could you advise what’s gone wrong, so we can take a look at how we can assist further? Thanks - Lee

@linhsolar Thanks for getting back to us. I’m glad to hear that you were able to request for a refund. I apologise if you weren’t accurately updated on what was happening with your flight. Please be assured that we will use your feedback to continue improve our service. Thanks – Yen
@linhsolar Sorry to hear this. Could you please DM your booking reference so I could check this further for you? -J

@linhsolar Hi, thanks for the tweet. Our flights are still departing as scheduled. If there are changes, we will contact passengers as soon as possible. Please keep an eye on our Travel Alerts page on our website for more information here: https://t.co/TPrCwIoenH -J

@jinahadam Hi Jinah. Thanks for reaching out. We receive so many requests like this, and while we would love to grant every request, we are not in a position to offer discounted flights as a low cost airline. We do appreciate your continued patronage to Jetstar. Regards - Ann

@AColinBell We have measures in place to receive daily feedback on the delivery of prepaid merchandise for all our flights. We use all feedback to drive improvement to our service so we appreciate your comments. –M

@MommyModeOn Thanks for the Tweet. To make sure that there’s room for everyone’s bags on some of our busiest flights, we have a team of cabin baggage officers making sure customers are boarding with the correct amount of luggage. –M
@AColinBell Hi Colin, sorry to hear this. Could you advise what has gone wrong in a DM along with your booking reference number? -Camille
@Goodnight_Zune Hey Dave, I'm sorry to hear this. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can take a look at this further? -J
@Niyati_amlani Hi Niyati, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. It may help to know that I have replied to your direct message. Regards - Joie

@palpatine42 Hi. Sorry to hear about the service provided by the check in staff. We do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times so it’s disappointing if this isn’t the level of service you received. Your feedback is important to us so we can improve our service. Thanks - H
@palpatine42 Thanks for your tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Thanks - Yen

@Nugisuke I'm sorry to hear your difficulties in receiving your itinerary on your flight from Singapore to Jakarta. So we could check this for you, please DM us your full name and email you used on the booking. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@lee_tennis Thanks for your reply. Could you tell us what has gone wrong? We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@lee_tennis Thanks for tagging us. Please know that you can check your flight status on our website here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP. Thanks - Jerry
@LiemLouis Hi, thanks for tagging us. How may we help you? - Jerry
@dglobalvoice Sorry to hear this D. Could you please DM your booking reference and full name so I can check this further? –M
@YeoWai Hi there, thanks for your tweet. Sorry to hear if you didn’t receive your boarding pass. I recommend you to approach our check-in staff so they can have this re-printed for you. Thanks - Lee
@shiqinyakob 2/2  For more information, please see here:https://t.co/Sf5CPyZH5u Thanks - H

@shiqinyakob 1/2 Hi. If you purchase a Starter fare with a bundle, in-flight meal or in-flight voucher maybe included depending on your flight. However you can also pre-purchase in-flight meals via Manage booking here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr.

data.text: @JPSakemoney I'm sorry to hear abut your difficulties in booking a flight on our website. We currently don't have any reported website outage so I suggest to clear your browsing cookies and cache to make sure you have the most updated version of our website. Let us know how you go. - Jerry

@elviranatliya I'm sorry to hear about the error on your itinerary. So we can check this for you, please DM us your booking reference along with your full name. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry

@buccelIatis I'm sorry to hear about your difficulties in receiving your itinerary. So we can check this for you, please DM us your booking reference and full name and email address. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@chelbrntr Hi there. I've already responded to your DM. Thanks - H

@joefranc Hi Joey, thanks for the Tweet. As of this writing, we don’t have any updates about affected flights regarding Runway Closure in Manila. Please be assured that affected passengers will be notified regarding this matter, once we have updates. –M
@livsosborne @cyryn_barnard Hi Cyryn. I'm sorry to hear if your flight was delayed. So we could check this for you, kindly provide your booking reference number and full name via DM? Thanks - H

data.text: @dammersaragih Thanks for your tweet, Dammer. I understand you'd like to change a name on your booking. Our other contact number can be seen here: https://t.co/hxkMGwA4BQ Alternatively, you can also send us a DM of your booking reference and full name of the passengers so we can assist. - Ann

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @Niyati_amlani Hi Niyati, thanks for the tweet and sorry to hear about the experience. Could you advise what’s gone wrong so we can further check at how we can assist you? Thanks - Lee

@MelindaButtle 2/2 The social media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace customers bags, rest assured that our Baggage Services team will review your case and will be in touch soon to follow up. Thanks - Lee

@MelindaButtle 1/3 Hi Mel, thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear about the delay on your baggage. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination.

@KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for your tweet. Yes, you are welcome to bring a noddle pack on-board with your carry-on bag provided that it does not exceed our overall weight and size restrictions for cabin baggage - https://t.co/wPBqWkVn6M. Thanks - Lee

@trivialullaby Thanks for tagging us about our carry-on baggage. You're allowed to bring 1 main item (56cm x 36cm x 23cm) plus 1 small item such as handbag total combined weight is 7kg. You can check more details here https://t.co/EFfSUE6GBO. Thanks - Jerry
